snippet.title: Kitsune’s Paths Tower Defense - English Demo TRAILER 🦊 - Torbellino Games
snippet.description:
First look at our demo teaser!
🦊

⛩️Kitsune's Paths is a 2D Tower Defense game with RPG elements, where you play as Zenko, a little fox guardian of the forest, tasked with protecting the Toriis that lead benevolent spirits to different spiritual planes. Use your powers, speed, and cleverness to ignite the turrets along the path, preventing Yokai from crossing and destroying the portals!👹

Wishlist now on STEAM!
🔗https://store.steampowered.com/app/3287330
🔗www.torbellinogames.com/wishlist

🎵Music & SFX:
Valentina Viola
Joaquin Bellas
Felipe Lamolle Genta
Gastón "Shios" Borges
Damián Montes de Oca
Ignacio Fernández "Ignacio Trovador"
Augusto "Tito" Viera
Mastering: Pablo Peyrano

Follow us!
🌐 https://torbellinogames.com/
🔗 https://www.instagram.com/torbellino.games/
🔗 https://x.com/TorbellinoGS
🔗 https://www.tiktok.com/@torbellino.games
